achievements.name: Empires Will Rise
achievements.description: Construct your first Landmark.

achievements.name: Kingdoms Will Fall
achievements.description: Defeat 20 enemy units.

achievements.name: A New Age Is Upon Us
achievements.description: Complete the Introductory Tutorial.

achievements.name: The Normans
achievements.description: Complete The Normans campaign.

achievements.name: The Hundred Years War
achievements.description: Complete The Hundred Years War campaign.

achievements.name: The Mongol Empire
achievements.description: Complete The Mongol Empire campaign.

achievements.name: The Rise of Moscow
achievements.description: Complete The Rise of Moscow campaign.

achievements.name: Age of Empires IV Campaign
achievements.description: Complete the Age of Empires IV campaigns

achievements.name: Counter-Raider
achievements.description: Loot the Danish war camp during the North to York mission.

achievements.name: Chivalry
achievements.description: Enlist the aid of 45 Knights during the Battle of Tinchebray.

achievements.name: Siegebreaker
achievements.description: Defeat the siege before the Keep takes damage during the First Battle of Lincoln.

achievements.name: Quit Touching Me!
achievements.description: Stop any of the city's walls being destroyed during the Siege of Wallingford.

achievements.name: Fill the Coffers
achievements.description: Collect every treasure chest during the Battle of Patay.

achievements.name: Battle Royal
achievements.description: Field a Royal siege unit with all the brothers' bonuses during Retake Normandy.

achievements.name: Careful Cannons
achievements.description: Win the Battle of Formigny without losing any cannons.

achievements.name: Twinkle Hooves
achievements.description: Don't lose any Mangudai during the Battle of the Kalka River.

achievements.name: Yeah, Well, You Should See the Other Guy
achievements.description: Lose a unit to the Front Gate of Zhangjiakou during the Great Wall mission.

achievements.name: Forgot a Batu
achievements.description: Kill double the enemies as Batu when assaulting the bridge in the Battle of Mohi.

achievements.name: Boom Boom Pao
achievements.description: Don't lose any Huihui Pao during the Fall of Xiangyang.

achievements.name: Keep the Change
achievements.description: Pay off the Mongols within 3 minutes during the Tribute mission.

achievements.name: Get Off My Bailey!
achievements.description: Stop the Mongols from entering the outer city during Hold Against the Horde.

achievements.name: Ancient Tower Defense
achievements.description: Kill 50 enemies with Wooden Fortresses during the Great Stand on the Ugra River.

achievements.name: Classic Conquest
achievements.description: Destroy all enemy units and production buildings during the Siege of Kazan.

achievements.name: The Fundamentals
achievements.description: Complete the Training Mastery.

achievements.name: Quick Study
achievements.description: Complete your first Civilization Mastery task.

achievements.name: Master of the French
achievements.description: Complete the French Mastery.

achievements.name: Master of the Holy Roman Empire
achievements.description: Complete the Holy Roman Empire Mastery.

achievements.name: Master of the Delhi Sultanate
achievements.description: Complete the Delhi Sultanate Mastery.

achievements.name: Master of the Chinese
achievements.description: Complete the Chinese Mastery.

achievements.name: Master of the Abbasid Dynasty
achievements.description: Complete the Abbasid Dynasty Mastery.

achievements.name: Recorded History
achievements.description: View a replay.

achievements.name: By Force
achievements.description: Achieve a Landmarks Victory.

achievements.name: By Faith
achievements.description: Achieve a Sacred Victory.

achievements.name: By Fortune
achievements.description: Achieve a Wonder Victory.

achievements.name: Make It Quick
achievements.description: Achieve a Landmarks Victory in the Dark Age (I).

achievements.name: Walk the Earth
achievements.description: Achieve a Sacred Victory without losing a religious unit.

achievements.name: Wonderstruck
achievements.description: Achieve a Wonder Victory without constructing walls.

achievements.name: Precious Medals
achievements.description: Earn a Medal in 3 Art of War challenges.

achievements.name: Challenge Taker
achievements.description: Earn your first Gold Medal in an Art of War challenge.

achievements.name: Record Breaker
achievements.description: Earn a Gold Medal in 5 Art of War challenges.

achievements.name: Sub-Human Subduer
achievements.description: Win a 1v1 match against the Easy A.I.

achievements.name: Par-Human Potentate
achievements.description: Win a 1v1 match against the Intermediate A.I.

achievements.name: High-Human Hero
achievements.description: Win a 1v1 match against the Hard A.I.

achievements.name: Super-Human Subjugator
achievements.description: Win a 1v1 match against the Hardest A.I.

achievements.name: The Faithful
achievements.description: Convert 30 enemies without holding a Relic as the Abbasid Dynasty.

achievements.name: All the World's Knowledge
achievements.description: During a match, research everything in the wings of the Abbasid House of Wisdom.

achievements.name: Shifting Winds
achievements.description: Defeat 1,000 enemy cavalry units with your Camel Riders as the Abbasid Dynasty.

achievements.name: A Golden Age
achievements.description: Achieve the third tier of the Golden Age as the Abbasid Dynasty.

achievements.name: Dread Fort
achievements.description: Kill 100 enemies with Keeps as the English.

achievements.name: Pass the Marshmallows
achievements.description: Use the Setup Camp ability 20 times as the English.

achievements.name: Lancerlot
achievements.description: Charge an enemy with 50 Royal Knights simultaneously as the French.

achievements.name: Who Needs Infantry?
achievements.description: Win a match without producing infantry as the French.

achievements.name: Big Shot
achievements.description: Destroy 1,000 enemy units with gunpowder siege engines as the French.

achievements.name: Do You Deliver?
achievements.description: Accrue 1,000 Food from Traders in a single match as the French.

achievements.name: Wild's Bounty
achievements.description: Accrue 2,000 Gold with Hunting Cabins in a single match as the Rus.

achievements.name: Big Game Hunter
achievements.description: Earn 500 Gold from bounties in a match as the Rus.

achievements.name: Deforestation
achievements.description: Gather Wood 1,000 times as the Rus.

achievements.name: In Memory of Kulikovo
achievements.description: Enhance 10 units with a single Saint's Blessing strike as the Rus.

achievements.name: Raiding Party
achievements.description: Raid an enemy building in the Dark Age (I) as the Mongols.

achievements.name: Jagutu-iin Darga
achievements.description: Enhance 100 units with a single Khan Signal Arrow as the Mongols.

achievements.name: Long Live the Khan
achievements.description: Win a match without your Khan being killed as the Mongols.

achievements.name: Explore, Expand, Exploit
achievements.description: Accrue 10,000 Stone in a single match as the Mongols.

achievements.name: Who Needs Cavalry?
achievements.description: Win a match without producing cavalry as the Holy Roman Empire.

achievements.name: Inspired Economics
achievements.description: Have at least 60 simultaneously inspired Villagers as the Holy Roman Empire.

achievements.name: Servants of the Land
achievements.description: Kill 10,000 enemies with Landsknechte.

achievements.name: Swift Site
achievements.description: Begin capturing a Sacred Site immediately upon entering Age III as the Holy Roman Empire.

achievements.name: Herd You Like Elephants
achievements.description: Destroy 100 enemy buildings with your elephants as the Delhi Sultanate.

achievements.name: Field Construction
achievements.description: Build a Stone Wall, Gate, and Tower using infantry as the Delhi Sultanate.

achievements.name: Higher Education
achievements.description: Have 20 Scholars garrisoned in a Madrasa as the Delhi Sultanate.

achievements.name: Pantomath
achievements.description: Research all technologies in a match as the Delhi Sultanate.

achievements.name: Be Subtle
achievements.description: Reveal 300 Villagers with a single use of Imperial Spies as the Chinese.

achievements.name: Great Walls
achievements.description: Construct 1,000 Stone Walls as the Chinese.

achievements.name: Move Like Wind, Attack Like Fire
achievements.description: Defeat 1,000 enemy units with the Nest of Bees as the Chinese.

achievements.name: Four Histories
achievements.description: Establish all of the Dynasties in a single match as the Chinese.

achievements.name: Wololottery
achievements.description: Assume control of 25 units in a single conversion.

achievements.name: Having a Blast
achievements.description: Destroy 5 enemies with a single Demolition Ship detonation.

achievements.name: All Creek, No Paddle
achievements.description: Sink an enemy Transport Ship that is garrisoned to max capacity.

achievements.name: Through the Ages
achievements.description: Advance to the next Age 500 times.

achievements.name: Coast Is Clear
achievements.description: Win a match during which fishing was your only source of gathered Food.

achievements.name: Accurate Likeness
achievements.description: Equip your first portrait.

achievements.name: To Remind, To Advise, To Warn
achievements.description: Equip your first monument.

achievements.name: A Heraldic Achievement
achievements.description: Customize your coat of arms.

achievements.name: Du Bois Are Back in Town
achievements.description: Win in the arena without losing more than 10 units during the Combat of the Thirty.

achievements.name: We Charge Extra for That
achievements.description: Shutdown a Cavalry Charge with Palings as the English.

achievements.name: Hope Is Kindled
achievements.description: Extend the Network of Castles alarm across 12 buildings simultaneously as the English.

achievements.name: Master of the English
achievements.description: Complete the English Mastery.

achievements.name: Master of the Mongols
achievements.description: Complete the Mongol Mastery.

achievements.name: Master of the Rus
achievements.description: Complete the Rus Mastery.

achievements.name: Master of the Ages
achievements.description: Complete all Civilization Masteries.

achievements.name: Ottoman Expansion
achievements.description: Win a match as the Ottomans.

achievements.name: Transcontinental Empire
achievements.description: Win 20 matches as the Ottomans.

achievements.name: Regimented Training
achievements.description: Have 5 Military Schools active at the same time as the Ottomans.

achievements.name: Mobile Strikes
achievements.description: Defeat 100 ranged units with a Sipahi unit as the Ottomans.

achievements.name: A Wonderful Cannon
achievements.description: Destroy a Wonder with a Great Bombard as the Ottomans.

achievements.name: Sound Advice
achievements.description: Unlock 7 Imperial Council upgrades in a single match as the Ottomans.

achievements.name: Hell of a Beat
achievements.description: Defeat 500 enemies with units affected by Mehteran as the Ottomans.

achievements.name: Trojan Horses
achievements.description: Garrison units into 3 Trebuchets as the Ottomans.

achievements.name: Malian Rise
achievements.description: Win a match as the Malians.

achievements.name: Trans-Saharan Empire
achievements.description: Win 20 matches as the Malians.

achievements.name: Tax Collector
achievements.description: Generate tax from 5 Toll Outposts on a single trip as the Malians.

achievements.name: From the Shadows
achievements.description: Attack 100 enemies with invisible Musofadi Warriors or Gunners in a single match as the Malians.

achievements.name: Just a Prick
achievements.description: Defeat a Heavy Cavalry unit with a Poisoned Arrow as the Malians.

achievements.name: All Mine
achievements.description: Gather Gold 1,000 times from Open Pit Mines as the Malians.

achievements.name: Aerial Poisoned Attacks
achievements.description: Defeat 500 units with Poisoned Arrow as the Malians.

achievements.name: All in the Ranch
achievements.description: Garrison 20 Cattle in Ranches at the same time as the Malians.

achievements.name: Master of the Ottomans
achievements.description: Complete the Ottoman Mastery.

achievements.name: Master of the Malians
achievements.description: Complete the Malian Mastery.

achievements.name: The Ottoman Arts
achievements.description: Earn a gold medal in the Ottoman Art of War challenge.

achievements.name: The Malian Arts
achievements.description: Earn a gold medal in the Malian Art of War challenge.

achievements.name: Win for the Empire
achievements.description: Win a match as the Byzantines.

achievements.name: Protecting Constantinople
achievements.description: Win 20 matches as the Byzantines.

achievements.name: Unsinkable
achievements.description: Construct a Transport Ship with a Varangian Guard and garrison it to maximum capacity as the Byzantines.

achievements.name: Getting Some Help
achievements.description: Recruit 60 mercenaries from a Mercenary House in a single match as the Byzantines.

achievements.name: Bulwark
achievements.description: Defeat 200 enemies with Limitanei while Shield Wall is active as the Byzantines.

achievements.name: Let There Be Fire
achievements.description: Destroy 50 buildings with Cheirosiphons as the Byzantines.

achievements.name: Overflow
achievements.description: Build 10 Cisterns in a single match as the Byzantines.

achievements.name: Let It Flow
achievements.description: Accrue 2,000 Olive Oil in a single match as the Byzantines.

achievements.name: A First for the Emperor
achievements.description: Win a match as the Japanese.

achievements.name: Established Lands
achievements.description: Win 20 matches as the Japanese.

achievements.name: Protecting Us
achievements.description: Heal 20 units using Shinto Priest units in a single match as the Japanese.

achievements.name: Daimyo Mastery
achievements.description: Spend Stone to research all Town Center upgrades as the Japanese.

achievements.name: Exchange Rates
achievements.description: Convert Stone to Gold at a Forge 250 times in a single match as the Japanese.

achievements.name: Shinobi Mastermind
achievements.description: Use Sabotage to disable 50 buildings with Shinobi units as the Japanese.

achievements.name: Gunpowder Mastery
achievements.description: Defeat 50 siege units using Ozutsu units as the Japanese.

achievements.name: Successful Gatherer
achievements.description: Enhance 10 resource drop-off buildings by depositing a Yorishiro as the Japanese.

achievements.name: The Sultans
achievements.description: Complete The Sultans Ascend campaign.

achievements.name: Master Naval Trader
achievements.description: Have 20 Trade Ships trading simultaneously during the Raiders of the Red Sea.

achievements.name: In the Lead by a Quarter Nile
achievements.description: Capture all Control Points during Into Egypt.

achievements.name: Saving the Day Early
achievements.description: Eliminate all 3 enemy leaders within 30 seconds of each other during the Battle of Mansurah.

achievements.name: Rescue
achievements.description: Rescue all the prisoners during the Invasion of Cyprus.

achievements.name: Victory Through Cross and Sword
achievements.description: Win a Multiplayer or Skirmish match with Knights Templar.

achievements.name: Journey to the Sacred Land
achievements.description: As the Knights Templar, have 50 Pilgrims reach a sacred site.

achievements.name: Castle Crasher
achievements.description: Destroy an enemy building with the Trebuchet Emplacement.

achievements.name: 'Tis But a Scratch
achievements.description: Heal allied units by 500 health with the Hospitaller Knight.

achievements.name: Feeding the Rich
achievements.description: Generate 2000 Gold with the Pilgrim Loan at the market.

achievements.name: The Red Rose Flourishes
achievements.description: Win a Multiplayer or Skirmish match with the House of Lancaster.

achievements.name: Blot out the Sun
achievements.description: As the House of Lancaster, hit 500 times using the Yeoman's Synchronized Shot.

achievements.name: My House is Richer Than Yours
achievements.description: Generate 4000 Gold with Manors in one match.

achievements.name: Lead the Charge
achievements.description: Empower at least 30 units with all 4 Lords of Lancaster at once.

achievements.name: Knife to Meet You
achievements.description: Kill 50 units with Earl's Guards after researching Throwing Dagger Drills.

achievements.name: Against All Odds
achievements.description: Defeat the French army at Agincourt.

achievements.name: Get Off My Lawn
achievements.description: Destroy the army besieging Safed.

achievements.name: Jerusalem Has Come
achievements.description: Capture all Sacred Sites and drive the Ayyubids out of Montgisard.

achievements.name: A Rose for the Fallen
achievements.description: Survive the Aftermath of Towton.

achievements.name: Conqueror of History
achievements.description: Complete all Historical Battles in Conqueror Mode.
